short_summary: National Research Council of Canada has a requirement for up to 12 channels of a multichannel potentiostat that is equipped for high throughput experimentation and suitable for the scientific community.
description: Up to 12 multiple GALVANO , kwot XIll that are individually controled via a python-based API that will be tied into a material acceleration platform at nrc mississauga autobissetted to analyse the battries . AsiimilihleWizard will be automated in its analysis as part of an automated synthesis and testing unit.
